name: OscillaCat
description: OscillaCat is a playful and agile oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant rossoCorsa colored box and cat-shaped buttons and arms and legs, OscillaCat adds a touch of feline charm to the world of technology. Its screen, shaped like a curled-up snake, displays mesmerizing waveforms and data with precision and grace. OscillaCat is a perfect blend of functionality and aesthetics, making it a beloved companion for both gadget enthusiasts and art lovers alike.
